Press Release



19 SEP 2025







Singapore Ramps Up AI Push for 2,000 Local Enterprises to Turn Digital Ambition into Real-world Impact



In the push to accelerate the adoption of AI in enterprises, IMDA will intensify efforts under its Digital Leaders Programme (DLP) to support 2,000 local digitally mature enterprises or Digital Leaders from various sectors to harness AI with confidence over the next three years.
